item.recall.recall_scroll.unbound_toolti: Use to bind this scroll to your current location.
item.recall.recall_scroll.recall_tooltip: Teleports you to the bound location.
item.recall.recall_scroll.return_tooltip: Returns you to the point you recalled from.
item.recall.recall_tome.unbound_tooltip: Use to permanently bind this tome to your current location.
item.recall.recall_tome.recall_tooltip: Teleports you to the bound location.
item.recall.recall_tome.return_tooltip: Returns you to the point you recalled from.
